name: heretic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who has an opinion that is opposite to or against the official or popular opinion: He complained that anyone who challenges an assumption about global warming gets branded a heretic. When he began to enunciate his views, Friedman was largely considered a heretic.
someone who has beliefs that are against the principles of a particular religion: They learned how Catholics persecuted heretics in the Middle Ages. Akhenaten was declared a heretic for challenging established religion by worshipping one god.
